mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN CAST(create_time AS DATE) = CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 END) AS today, COUNT(CASE WHEN CAST(create_time AS DATE) = (CURRENT_DATE - 1) THEN 1 END) AS yesterday, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = '已完成' THEN 1 END) AS completed FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task
SELECT type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task GROUP BY type
SELECT type, status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task GROUP BY type, status

SELECT t.executor_id AS executorId, u.username AS executorName, COUNT(*) AS taskCount FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task t LEFT JOIN sub_track_plat.user u ON u.user_id = t.executor_id GROUP BY t.executor_id, u.username

SELECT CAST(create_time AS DATE) AS inspectionDate, COUNT(*) AS createdCount, SUM(CASE WHEN status = '已完成' AND CAST(actual_end AS DATE) = CAST(create_time AS DATE) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completedCount FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task WHERE create_time >= (CURRENT_DATE - 7) GROUP BY CAST(create_time AS DATE) ORDER BY inspectionDate
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS yearMonth, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sub_track_plat.inspect_task GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY yearMonth DESC
